On 11/6/07, Etan Wexler <yahoo.com@...> wrote:
> I've noticed that most of the discussion on rest-discuss is not about
> REST, but about details of implementing HTTP.

In large part, though, isn't REST *about* the details of implementing HTTP?

Maybe that's just me.
